name: Hypnotic (tarrcolt)
description:
HYPNOTIC is a game that was made for the GMTK2020 Game Jam based around the theme "out of control". In HYPNOTIC your controls are literally "out of control" because every turn the keys you use rearrange. For example if the "up" key is in the "left" position, pressing "up" on your keyboard will make you go "left".

CONTROLS:

  • ENTER: MENU SELECT
  • ARROW KEYS: MOVE

Note: If you get a score above 70 I'm impressed!
